name: AI Financial Agent
description: An AI-powered financial analysis and research agent built with Next.js

HEROKU_INFERENCE_API_KEY.description: Heroku Inference API key (automatically provided by heroku-inference addon)

OPENAI_API_KEY.description: Your OpenAI API key from https://platform.openai.com/ (optional if using Heroku Inference)

FINANCIAL_DATASETS_API_KEY.description: Your Financial Datasets API key from https://financialdatasets.ai/

LANGCHAIN_API_KEY.description: Your LangSmith API key from https://smith.langchain.com/

AUTH_SECRET.description: A random secret for NextAuth.js. Generate one at https://generate-secret.vercel.app/32

DATABASE_URL.description: PostgreSQL database URL (automatically provided by Heroku Postgres addon)
